name: Halloween: Trick or Treat 2
description:
The most Awesome Halloween ever!

Springfield is hosting a Costume Parade, Spooky Museum, Dracula’s Castle in the Mall, a Haunted Hotel and new Trunk or Treat at the Church.

Emma and Mike buy then carve Pumpkins, then dress as a Witch and Pirate. They go Trick or Treating and visit all the Town’s events. They eventually get home after many Treats, and a Trick or two! They check out their Treats then it’s time for bed.

Halloween : Trick or Treat 2 is crammed full of fabulous Hog scenes and lots of puzzles for players of all ages and guarantees hours of fun and enjoyment.
